name: Renamed SysInternals Debug View
description: Detects suspicious renamed SysInternals DebugView execution
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.product:(Sysinternals\ DebugView OR Sysinternals\ Debugview) AND (NOT (process.pe.original_file_name:Dbgview.exe AND process.executable:*\\Dbgview.exe)))`
